definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: For no-frills environmental commitment, one cannot overlook Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 对于无虚饰环保运动，我们不能轻视佛蒙特州。

sentences.english: The program's curriculum is designed to comply with the state of Vermont's science standards.
sentences.chinese: 该方案的课程设计符合佛蒙特州的科学标准状态。

sentences.english: Put pet food warehouse and other places, and your "pets" in Burlington, Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 宠物食品仓库等地，把你的宠物在佛蒙特州伯灵顿。

sentences.english: You'll come visit us in vermont ?
sentences.chinese: 你会来佛蒙特州看我们的吧？

sentences.english: But a community choir in Vermont is trying something different.
sentences.chinese: 但是佛蒙特州的一个社区唱诗班却是独辟蹊径。

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a porch roof in the northeast of Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 图为佛蒙特州东北部，冰柱挂于门廊屋顶上。

sentences.english: A nice guy from Vermont drove all the way down to see me.
sentences.chinese: 一个好男人从佛蒙特州一路开车来看我。

sentences.english: I also ate maple sugar candy , which is a special candy made in Vermont .
sentences.chinese: 我还吃了枫糖，那是佛蒙特州的特产。

sentences.english: John Dewey was born in Burlington, Vermont, in eighteen fifty-nine.
sentences.chinese: 约翰杜威出生于1959年佛蒙特州伯灵顿。

sentences.english: A：To a small, cozy place in Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 去了佛蒙特州一个小巧安逸的地方。

pinyin: Xin1 Han3 bu4 shi2 er3 zhou1
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
Xi1 Fu2 ji2 ni2 ya4 zhou1
